subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for laying of Regulations made by NHAI under Section 35 of NHAI Act; 1988 before both Houses of the Parliament â€“ reg.
text: HRd <5ty rTHTf qifea5rut (7335 4Raev &1 TTHN AATT4, IRG FTFR) National Highways Authority of India Ha TM (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Gi-5 W 6, 747r-10, E1A, # Rvrit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TA/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Administration/2024 Policy Circular No: 1.10.7 dated 26th February, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/FGA/CAG/2021-22 /Followup/ Issue#58 (Comp. No. 184717)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for laying of Regulations made by NHAI under Section 35 of NHAI Act, 1988 before both Houses of the Parliament reg: It has been decided that in order to ensure laying of Gazette Notifications related to Regulations made by NHAI under Section 35 of the NHAI Act, 1988 before both Houses of the Parliament; the following Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) shall be followed: (a) After publication of the Gazette Notification related to Regulations made by Policy Section, NHAI under Section 35 of NHAI Act, 1988 or their amendments, it will be sent to Establishment Section of MoRTGH with a request to it before both Houses of the Parliament and provide the date of laying to NHAI for records. (b) Thereafter , it shall be laid by MoRT&H with the approval of the Hon'ble Minister (RT&H) or Hon'ble MOS (RT&H) as the case may be as per prescribed procedure_ (c) Section of NHAI will follow up with Establishment Section of MoRTGH for obtaining the date of laying of such Regulations. (d) Policy Section of NHAI shall also check from the bulletins of the both Houses of the Parliament about the date of laying of such Regulations for records: (e) A copy of the Bulletin or an intimation received from MoRTGH about date of laying shall also be kept in the concerned File/E-file for records. 2. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. edex24 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: AIl Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1_ Deputy Secretary (Esstt:) , MoRTAH. 2.
